name: Treasure Quest (itch) (GinaGriza, jerichovillena)
description:
Answer the math questions to find your treasure and collect gold along the way! The faster you answer the questions, the more gold you get.

You can choose your level and name your pirate ship before you start the game.

Producer - Ben Chapman

Designer - Jericho Villena

Creative Director and Artist - Gina Griza

Programmer - Connor Wegner

Artist - Rob Moreno
